channel.title: Short Course on NCEAS Training Materials Catalog
channel.description: Recent content in Short Course on NCEAS Training Materials Catalog

item.title: Reproducible Research Techniques for Synthesis (July 2021)
item.description: Dates: July 8-9, 12-14, 2021 Location: Remote This 5-day workshop will provide researchers with an overview of best data management practices, data science tools, and concrete steps and methods for more easily producing transparent, reproducible workflows. This opportunity is for researchers from across career stages and sectors who want to gain fundamental data science skills that will improve their reproducible research techniques, particularly for the purposes of synthesis science.
